message:
<system-reminder>
🤖 AGENT LOADED - READY:
🤖 @TEST-ORCHESTRATOR-AGENT LOADED: Follow agent's specialized workflow
⚠️ REMEMBER: This was a one-time load - don't call again this session
</system-reminder>

📋 REVIEW: Check task status and plan next actions
</system-reminder>

</system-reminder>

</system-reminder>
